# GitHub Configuration

## Repository Metadata

### Basic Information

- **Name**: foxy-duo-proxy
- **Description**: Unified proxy and DuoPlus management system with feature flags and enhanced templates
- **Homepage**: https://github.com/brendadeeznuts1111/foxy-duo-proxy
- **Private**: Yes

### URLs

- **Repository**: https://github.com/brendadeeznuts1111/foxy-duo-proxy

### Contributing Guidelines

- Create issues for bugs and features
- Use conventional commit messages
- Follow TypeScript and ESLint rules
- Add tests for new features
- Update documentation

## Security and Compliance

### Security Policy

- Report vulnerabilities privately
- Security updates via patch releases
- Dependabot enabled for dependencies
- Code scanning enabled

### Dependencies

- **Runtime**: Bun
- **Framework**: React + TypeScript
- **Build**: Vite
- **Testing**: Vitest + Testing Library
- **Linting**: ESLint + Prettier

## Deployment and CI/CD

### GitHub Actions Workflows

- **CI**: Test and build on push/PR
- **Release**: Automated on tag creation
- **Security**: Dependency scanning
- **Deploy**: Staging and production environments

### Environment Variables

- **Development**: All feature flags enabled
- **Production**: Selective feature flags
- **Testing**: Mock configurations

## Analytics and Insights

### Repository Traffic

- **Clones**: Track repository interest
- **Views**: Monitor README engagement
- **Forks**: Track community adoption
- **Stars**: Measure popularity

### Contribution Metrics

- **Commits**: Development activity
- **Pull Requests**: Code review process
- **Issues**: Bug tracking and features
- **Releases**: Version management
